name: Telegram Inliner
author: Websima Creative Agency

sections.description:
With the new in-line mode, bots become omnipresent and can be used as a tool in any of your chats, groups or channels – it doesn’t matter, whether the bot is a member or not.

Telegram Inliner (Telegram Search Plugin) helps you to integrate Telegram inline bot to your WordPress site and receive search results.

first of all you have to Create a New Bot and get your Token API, then setinilne mode for your bot.

Features:

  • search in custom post types
  • understand which results gets more clicks by users
  • No results Template
  • Message Template

Note: this plugin is working only using webhook and needs a free account from https://teletter.net
sections.installation:
From your WordPress dashboard
1. Visit ‘Plugins > Add New’

  1. Search for ‘Telegram Inliner’

  2. Activate Telegram Inliner from your Plugins page. (You’ll be greeted with a Welcome page.)

From WordPress.org
1. Download Inliner.

  1. Upload the ‘Telegram Inliner’ directory to your ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory, using your favourite method (ftp, sftp, scp, etc…)
    Activate Telegram Inliner from your Plugins page.

Extra
Visit ‘Inlier Settings’ and adjust your configuration.

a new Page Template is added as ‘Inliner Page’, make a new page, use this template set your Webhook to this page.
sections.faq:
Does it work with webhook method?

Yes, But you should first create a free account on teletter.net
sections.changelog:
1.2

Custom Post Types
Message Template

1.0

  • get updates from teletter.net
